Description:
We will conduct one-to-one interviews with frontline staff who regularly use the internal case management system.

The aim is to understand how they complete daily tasks and where they encounter friction or delays.

Sessions will last around 45 minutes and will include both open questions and task-based prompts.

Findings will help identify unmet needs, opportunities to simplify processes, and areas for training.

Insights will feed into service design decisions and prioritisation for the next delivery phase.
